code: import{Grid}from'@mui/material';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{DataBadge}from'../../components/vb_stat_display';import{vbActionEfficiency,vbActionTotal}from'../../utils/Calculator';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BlockSection=function BlockSection(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:2,sx:{paddingTop:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataBadge,{title:"Points",data:props.point||0})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataBadge,{title:"Errors",data:props.error})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataBadge,{title:"Touches",data:props.success})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataBadge,{title:"Total",data:vbActionTotal(props)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataBadge,{title:"Efficiency",data:"".concat(vbActionEfficiency(props),"%")})})]});};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{point:state.sessionStats.present.block.point||0,error:state.sessionStats.present.block.error,success:state.sessionStats.present.block.success};};export default connect(mapStateToProps)(BlockSection);
